sections.education:
Vellore Institute Of Technology Vellore, India
Bachelor of Technology in Information Technology September 2022 - July 2026
sections.experience:
Project Intern | Certificate June 2025 – July 2025
Hindustan Petroleum Corporation Limited Hyderabad, India
• Optimized dependency resolution using HashMap/HashSet lookups, cutting time complexity from O(N²) to O(N).
• Automated scalable workflow routing and approval pipelines to reduce manual intervention.
• Implemented hierarchical RBAC enforcement to secure data access across organizational levels.
• Skills : React, RESTful APIs, Spring Boot, MySQL, Spring Data JPA, Spring Security, Maven
Freelance Front-End Developer Feb. 2025 – March 2025
The House Of Pool Vellore, India
• Automated usage-based billing, reducing manual reconciliation time by 80%.
• Built O(N log N) multi-criteria ranking to prioritize dashboards and separate active/closed sessions in real time.
• Built real-time inventory & sales pipelines using O(1) hash lookups and debouncing to ensure consistency.
• Scaled system to 50+ concurrent sessions, syncing hundreds of daily inventory events with sub-second latency.
• Skills : React, JavaScript, Real-time Data Sync , Firebase, MongoDB
sections.projects:
Recrut – AI-Native Hiring Platform | Link Nov. 2025 – Dec. 2025
• Engineered a distributed Node.js code runner using ephemeral Docker & kernel isolation for untrusted execution.
• Built sliding-window ring buffers to smooth gaze streams and compute variance, cutting false alerts.
• Built a semaphore-throttled task queue to regulate parallel YOLO inference, ensuring stable throughput at scale.
• Engineered Monaco-based IDE with custom language servers and real-time validation matching production
workflows.
• Skills : React, Electron, Node.js, Express.js, Prisma, Computer Vision, Generative AI, Docker, Zod, JWT(Auth).
Cinepolis API Security Research Sept. 2025 – Oct. 2025
• Performed controlled MITM simulations to assess API integrity and transport-layer trust.
• Discovered and responsibly disclosed a backend validation flaw in Cinepolis India’s booking system.
• Demonstrated payload tampering paths bypassing client-side checks, driving server-side hardening.
• Skills : Puppeteer.js, Node.js, Postman
Eagle View - Stock Market App | Link Sept. 2024 – Sept. 2025
• Designed low-latency market dashboard ingesting live stock feeds for real-time pricing and insights.
• Deployed cloud-native services on AWS with Kubernetes to enable scalable, fault-tolerant operations.
• Implemented RAG pipelines leveraging LLMs and NLP to power intelligent, data-driven workflows.
• Skills : RAG Pipeline, Kubernetes, React , MongoDB, AWS, Express.js, LLMs, Computer Vision, NLP.
Decentralized Crypto Lending Platform | Link Nov. 2024 – Dec. 2024
• Optimized smart contracts using L2 rollups (Optimism, Arbitrum), cutting gas costs by 90%.
• Designed an ETH-collateralized lending protocol with on-chain borrowing and token minting logic.
• Implemented O(n) loan-state aggregation to sync dynamic on-chain data with accurate portfolio balances at scale.
• Skills : Solidity, Optimism , Arbitrum, Hardhat, Web3.js, Ethers.js, Ethereum, Smart Contract
Relevant Coursework
Core Computer Science: Data Structures & Algorithms, Operating Systems, Database Management Systems,
Computer Networks, Blockchain.
Web & Systems Engineering: Frontend & Backend Development, MERN Stack, RESTful APIs, System Design.
DevOps & Cloud: CI/CD Pipelines, Containerization (Docker), Cloud Infrastructure (AWS), Kubernetes Basics.
sections.skills_text:
Languages: C/C++, JavaScript, HTML/CSS, Solidity
Frameworks: React, Node.js, Express.js, Spring Boot, Spring Data JPA, Spring Security, Maven
AI / Computer Vision: OpenCV, YOLO, LLMs, NLP, Generative AI
Database: MySQL, MongoDB, Google FireBase
Other Essential Technologies: Git/GitHub, Docker, JWT(Auth), NPM, AWS, Kubernetes, API Testing, CI/CD
